publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4318 Stuart McMillan: Top Award for Inverclyde Athletic Club—That the Parliament congratulates Inverclyde Athletic Club on being awarded the prestigious Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service; notes that the award recognises the outstanding contributions made to local communities by groups voluntarily devoting their time for the benefit of others; further notes that 406 groups were nominated for this award and that Inverclyde Athletic Club was selected as one of 95 successful candidates; recognises the outstanding level of achievement that Inverclyde Athletic Club has attained since its establishment in 1996 and the significant contribution it has made to Scottish athletics; acknowledges the work done by all the members of the club, from athletes to committee members, and wishes them every success in their future endeavours.
S3M-4318 Top Award for Inverclyde Athletic Club (lodged on 5 June 2009) Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Trish Godman*
